title: New: LERK – Ellipse
content:
Since shuffling onto the scene a little under two weeks ago with his atmospheric debut track Creation, Boise producer LERK is back with more, in the form of the eclectic Ellipse.

Flitting between sampled reverb vocals and tinkling synth sections, Ellipse wouldn’t sound out of place on Balam Acab’s recent release, and certainly doesn’t pale in quality. Whilst Creation could have been viewed as being beginners luck, this new track proves that LERK certainly has a sparklingly bright future ahead of him.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
